title: Adding runtime warning for checkpointing inputs to have requires_grad=True
body_html: Currently, if the model has one input only (excluding the parameters), then the user needs to set requires_grad=True for backwards to work. This is needed because checkpointing function is an autograd function with no learnable parameters itself. I discussed with @colesbury , @ezyang , @gchanan in-person and we consented to have the warning and keep the feature in release notes.
